import{useState,useEffect}from'react';const useTypewriter=function(text){let speed=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:50;const[displayText,setDisplayText]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{setDisplayText('');// Reset on text change
